notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Sequence data analysis was done by B.Z., B.S.; writing—original draft preparation B.Z., G.K., A.N.; writing—review and editing, F.J., P.F., K.E., M.T., T.B.; conceptualization, G.K., F.J., A.N., O.N., K.E., O.K.-K., M.T.; sample collection G.K., B.S., Z.L., A.K. (Anett Kepner), M.M., T.S., K.E., P.M., K.U., O.K.-K., O.F., P.K., A.N., E.M.; visualization B.S., E.M.; laboratory processes B.Z., G.K., A.N., O.N., Z.L., G.E.T., A.K. (Anett Kuczmog), M.M.; collected, provided and visualized human epidemiological data E.M. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
